TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION:
Incoming Chests
Wondering when that Legendary or Epic chest is coming? We got you covered
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: You can also add any profile, of your friends or your favorite Youtube player!
TUTORIAL_SLIDE4_DESCRIPTION: Share with your friends and your clan!
ITEM_AVATAR_REQ: *All fields are required to create profile
LIST_TOAST:
Welcome : Press + to add your profile!
Instructions on Help tab
SEARCH_ADD: Search on your local Players list
ITEM_DETAILS_INVALID_LONG: Check the correct #TAG of your Clash Royale profile.Left Swipe on Players Tab page to delete this wrong user or press the trash button
ITEM_DETAILS_INVALID_LONG_2: Common mistake is writing O (letter) instead of 0 (number). Please check better.
ITEM_DETAILS_NEXTCHEST_LONG: Check how many chest you have to open until your Legendary!
ITEM_DETAILS_NEXTCHEST4: You need to open more chests to unlock good chest..
ITEM_DETAILS_WAIT_LONG: Wait some minutes and check again
ITEM_DETAILS_WAIT_LONG_2: If you see this page after 2-3h probably this is a WRONG TAG. Check Help tab for common mistake.
ITEM_DETAILS_UPDATE_DONE: Refresh requested! The update can require up to 2-3 minutes. So if it is not updated do it again
ITEM_DETAILS_MYCLAN_NOCLAN: You don't have any Clan on Clash Royale
ITEM_DETAILS_MYCLAN_ADD: Clan members that joined The Mad King
TAB3_RECENT: Recent players on The Mad King Clan
TAB4_TEXT3: Open Clash Royale. Press your name and under your profile page you will see your Clash Royale TAG.
TAB4_TEXT4: Look the example below, for example the tag : 2YJUJQLQ (without #)
TAB4_TEXT4_2: Check your TAG: maybe you copied O (letter) instead of 0 (number). Please check better.
TAB4_TEXT6: Open now this app. Go to Players and press the '+' add button on the top right corner. On the TAG input write your Clash Royale TAG (for example 2YJUJQLQ) and complete other settings
TAB4_TEXT61: Wrong name or hash? Left swipe on Players tab for delete it or press the trash button
TAB4_TEXT8: All done! Check your profile from Players tab.
TAB5_TEXT1: Finally you can save money and check when you will receive cool chest on Clash Royale.
TAB5_TEXT2_1: The Mad King is created for players by iTZUNAMI
TAB5_TEXT6: Help us to translate in your language!
